ShaderNodePreset.Description:
This Matchbox shader generates a fractal cell texture
Demo: https://vimeo.com/80257415
Contact us at dev@cpgp.nu if you want us to customize or create new shaders for you! Params: - Cell Speed: change the speed of the Cell generation, to get more or less 'life' - Use Light Modulation : adds flickering Based on http://glsl.heroku.com/e#12469.1 License Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License
ShaderNodePreset.Name: CPGP_FractalCell
